SELECT COUNT(*) FROM biz_user_history WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_user_history SET view_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, h.view_time AS viewTime FROM biz_user_history h INNER JOIN biz_article a ON h.article_id = a.id WHERE h.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY h.view_time DESC
